title: Average price of wearable technology products in the United Kingdom ( UK ) 2014
summary: This bar chart has 5 categories for the x axis representing Wearable Technology Products, and a y axis representing Average price in GBP.
The highest category is found at Action_cameras_headsets_and_glasses where Average price in GBP is 220.0.
The lowest category is found at Health_and_fitness_trackers where Average price in GBP is 73.0.
